narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
Applicant is ready for a class C license to exhibit small exotic mammals (armadillo, fennec fox, etc). 
A check for the appropriate license fee will be submitted to the Eastern Regional office. No regulated activity may be
conducted until the fee is processed and a certificate number has been issued. 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the applicant.
